d:
Mrs. Wilson wants a cure for ageing but finds herself with a difficult dilemma to resolve first. She loves her fragile husband, wants to protect him from unforeseen triggers, but needs to take drastic action with her son's friends to keep her marriage viable.
Noah is nearly 20 but looks not much more than half his age, could there be a medical breakthrough that cures Noah and helps Mrs. Wilson too?

NOTICE
This is Version 3

Visibility of versions 1 and 2 has been restricted. I am unsure as to why exactly but am assuming it is because Noah, whilst being nearly 20, as made clear in version 2, appears much younger because of his medical condition. That condition, it's diagnosis and treatment, together with Mrs. Wilson's fear of ageing are an integral part of the story.
In an effort to avoid future visibility problems, version 3 does not contain any panels (images) which feature Noah (whilst still young looking) in scenes where Mrs. Wilson is naked or semi-naked or indulging in sexually explicit activity.
I would request the moderators/censors to advise, in this section , should the restrictions imposed on versions 1 and 2 be for any reason other than Noah appearing to be younger than he is.
Thank you.
